rule: Each description must be composed in a single, unbroken paragraph without any line breaks.
input: A sunny meadow with wildflowers swaying in the breeze, a solitary bench under a large willow tree, and butterflies fluttering around.
output: In an expansive sunny meadow bathed in golden light from an ethereal summer sky, delicate wildflowers sway in gentle breezes while a solitary wooden bench shelters beneath the sprawling canopy of a giant willow tree. Butterflies of every hue flit about, their wings a blur of color against the vibrant backdrop. Feel the warm sun on your skin as you soak in the serene and enchanting beauty before you.
